name: Love Awake (Alpha)
description:
A short game for Yuri Game Jam 2017, about a knight and a princess that are in love and must complete a quest to save a kingdom from a curse, with the help of an assexual prince!

Game tip: explore! You can beat the game without exploring, but there is where a hid all the fun, haha /o/

I made this game cause I really wanted to join the jam and I had Mulan x Aurora feels (thanks OUAT ¬¬), it's simplistic and needs text revision, if you guys like it I'm totally up to polish it, add some art, and even improve the story (or another game maybe =D). I apreciate feedback! Thanks for coming /o/
